title: Total Drama 2
subtitle: The sequel that raised the stakes

placements.name: Duncan
placements.notes: Won Final Tribal — 5 votes to win • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 2 votes against

placements.name: Alejandro
placements.notes: 1 vote to win • 5 challenge wins • 5 immunity wins • 11 votes against

placements.name: Lindsay
placements.notes: 1 vote to win • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 1 votes against

placements.name: Beth
placements.notes: 2–1–1 vote • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • Found 1 idol • 4 votes against

placements.name: Trent
placements.notes: 5–2 vote • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 7 votes against

placements.name: Gwen
placements.notes: 4–4 tie → 5–1 revote • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 9 votes against

placements.name: Heather
placements.notes: 7–2 vote • 1 challenge wins • 1 immunity wins • 7 votes against

winner.name: Duncan
winner.description: Survived constant targeting, won immunity when it mattered, earned respect from allies and enemies, embodied endurance over control

fanFavorite.name: Alejandro
fanFavorite.description: Flashiest strategist of the season, always in the center of conflict, loved by viewers even when distrusted in-game

bestStrategic.name: Alejandro
bestStrategic.description: Multiple alliances across phases, correct reads on timing and targets, used protection without exposing himself, lost because jury wanted blood not polish

bestSocial.name: Lindsay
bestSocial.description: Strong bonds across every phase, rarely targeted despite lacking immunity wins, trusted by nearly everyone

bestUnderdog.name: Duncan
bestUnderdog.description: Frequently on wrong side of numbers, never collapsed socially, won without idols or twists

biggestVillain.name: Heather
biggestVillain.description: Weaponized secrecy, stirred paranoia before exit, left emotional damage behind

mostChaotic.name: Ezekiel
mostChaotic.description: Idol magnet, flip risks everywhere, personal grudges shaped votes

messiestFeud.description: Mutual extreme hatred, targeted each other repeatedly, defined multiple episodes

biggestBetrayal.description: Strategic, cold, perfectly timed - cost him jury votes but gained him control

bestPhysical.name: Alejandro & Duncan (Tie)
bestPhysical.description: Alejandro: consistency (5 immunities), Duncan: clutch wins

mostClutch.name: Alejandro
mostClutch.description: Winning final immunity - controlled Final Tribal setup, forced hard choices

mostLoyal.name: Beth
mostLoyal.description: Rarely flipped, stayed true even when risky, cast the only Lindsay jury vote

biggestMeltdown.name: Alejandro
biggestMeltdown.description: Emotional crack, targeted Trent openly, almost cost him the game

mostTragic.name: Gwen
mostTragic.description: Eliminated after tie + revote, targeted by both alliances, had social capital but not protection

quietestThreat.name: Lindsay
quietestThreat.description: Always in the numbers, rarely blamed, never fully exposed, game noticed too late

seasonMVP.name: Duncan
seasonMVP.description: Central to conflicts, final winner, most juror respect - if Season 2 were a story, Duncan is the spine

legacy.summary: Brought back 14 returnees for intense warfare. Duncan's survival story beat Alejandro's immunity dominance (5 wins!). The season proved strategy alone doesn't guarantee victory - the jury wanted blood and struggle.
memorableMoments: Duncan survives constant targeting and wins
Strategic MVP: Alejandro (flashy center of conflict)
